content: this legal document explains the progress of a case involving the dissolution of community property the court of appeal in milan has made a final resolution assigning different lots to the parties involved the parties are identified as za ma za is and za gi the court has ordered za gi to pay €396717 to za ma and za ma to pay €1276667 to za gi and €633384 to za gi and za ma the court has determined that the parties have joint several liability and assigned them proportionate shares of the costs the court has applied legal principles related to civil code articles regarding collation of assets and donations an expert was appointed to assess the property and propose a division plan the parties reached a settlement agreement which the court approved the court also considered expenses for improvements and building regularization allocating them proportionately among the parties the court has ordered the payment of the experts report costs and the costs of the proceedings additionally a bank filed a crossappeal requesting clarification on mortgages which the court partially accepted amendments were made to the original judgment and the court ordered the payment of specific sums by the parties and assigned joint liability for certain expenses the court also addressed the issue of mortgages and ordered the sharing of costs related to the experts report

metadata.CASE_ID: Corte appello Milano sez. II, 12/11/2019, n.4499
